komunitinIs: Komunitin is an open source platform that offers social currency management for exchange communities.
alreadyRegisteredToALocalGroup: Already registered to a local community?
findGroupNearby: Find a community near you and start using social currency
orSelectCountry: or select a country to find it
findComunnity: Find your community and start participating.
enableNotificationsText: Enable notifications to be aware of movements in your account and important news in your community. You can configure or disable them later.
deniedNotificationsText: This device blocks our notifications. You may allow notifications from Komunitin in your browser settings.
incompatibleNotificationsText: This device doesn't support web push notifications. If you're on Safari you may update to version 16.4.
enableLocationText: Let Komunitin know your location so it can sort resources based on proximity.
deniedLocationText: This device blocks access to your location so Komunitin can't sort resources by proximity. You may fix that in your browser settings.
transactionPayerHint: Choose the account from which the amount will be transferred.
transactionPayeeHint: Choose the account that will receive the transfer.
transactionDescriptionHint: Brief description of the concept of the exchange, for example '2kg of potatoes'.
transactionCommitted: The transfer has been successfully committed
transactionPending: The transfer is pending approval from the source
transactionRejected: The transfer has been rejected and will not be applied
needFormHelpText: Fill the details of your new need.
uploadNeedImagesHint: Adding a picture to a need makes it more attractive
title: Title
needDescriptionHint: Provide here all the details for other members to understand your need
needCategoryHint: Select the category that best describes your need
needExpirationDateHint: The date when your need will expire
needDescriptionRequired: Explain your need with some detail
needPublishedHint: Make this need visible to other members
deleteNeed: Do you want to delete the need {name}?
offerFormHelpText: Fill the details of your new offer.
uploadOfferImagesHint: Adding some pictures to an offer makes it more attractive
offerCategoryHint: Select the category that best describes your offer
offerTitleHint: A short title for your offer
offerDescriptionHint: Provide here all the details for other members to understand your offer
offerDescriptionRequired: Explain your offer with some detail
offerPriceHint: Enter just a number eg '10', or '15 Â¤/hour', or anything like 'depends on piece' or 'contact-me'
offerExpirationDateHint: The date when your offer will expire
offerPublishedHint: Make this offer visible to other members
deleteOffer: Do you want to delete the offer {name}?
acceptPaymentsHint: If enabled, transfers from your account requested by other members will be automatically accepted. Otherwise, you will have to accept them manually.
notificationsSettingsText: Configure the push notifications you receive in your devices.
myAccountNotificationsHint: Receive notifications about movements in your account: commited transfers, pending transfers, expired offers and needs...
editProfileHelpText: Fill the details of your profile as you want other members to see you.
name: Name
nameHint: Your full name or organization name as you want other members to see you
bioHint: A brief description of yourself or your organization
emailHint: Your email to log in and receive important notifications. Use the buton below to change it.
changePasswordText: Enter your current password and the new one you want to use.
oldPasswordHint: Enter your current password to confirm this action
newPasswordHint: Your new password must be at least 8 characters long
changeEmailText: Enter your current password and the new email you want to use from now on.
emailChangeHint: Your email must be valid and not already in use by another user
emailChanged: Your email has been changed to {email}.
resetPasswordText: Enter your email and we will send you a link to reset your password.
resetLinkSentText: We have sent you an email with a link to reset your password. Check your inbox and follow the instructions.
membershipTermsText: Please read carefully the terms of membership in this community and accept them to continue.
signupCredentialsText: Enter your name, email and set a password to create your account. You'll need to verify the email.
signupVerifyEmailText: We have sent you an email with a link to verify your email. Check your inbox and follow the instructions.
signupCompleteText: You have completed the signup process to the community {group}. Now your registration is pending approval by the community administrators. You will receive an email when you account is fully activated.
signupCompleteText2: Meanwhile you can complete your profile and improve your offers.
emailInUse: This email is already in use. If you want to register a new account, choose another email. If you want to recover the password for the existing account, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot password?'.
pendingAccountText: Your account is pending approval. You can't make transfers or see other members offers and needs until your account is activated by the community administrators.
disabledAccountText: Your account is disabled. Go to your settings to re-enable it before you can make transfers
suspendedAccountText: Your account has been suspended. Contact the community administrators to re-enable it.
groupDisabledText: Your community is disabled and you can't operate anymore. Contact the community administrators for more information.
emailsSettingsText: Configure the emails you receive in your inbox.
myAccountEmailsHint: Emails related to your account: transfers, expired offers and needs...
groupEmailsHint: Receive a compilation of latest offers, needs and statistics from your community.
createTransactionText: Fill the following fields to create a transfer that will move some amount between two accounts.
sendPaymentText: Select the member you want to send to, a description and the amount you will transfer from your account.
receivePaymentText: Select the member you want to receive from, a description and the amount you will receive to your account.
chooseAccountNoListingText: Type the account code in the external community '{group}'. You can also use the code scanner feature to read the transfer.
enterMultipleTransactionsText: Fill the following fields to create multiple transfers sequentially. You can also load them from a CSV file.
copyDescription: Use the same description for all transfers
importFileText: Select a CSV (Comma Separated Values) file with the transfers to import. The file must have exactly 4 columns in order: From, To, Description, Amount. The column Amount must be a number without any symbol and must be expressed in your currency unit. The app will discard the first row if it contains headers. You can create the file with a spreadsheet program.
errorInRows: There are errors in the following rows: {rows}
transactionsPending: {num} transfers are pending approval by the source
transactionsRejected: {num} transfers have been rejected and won't be applied
enterTransactionDataQR: Set a description and an amount to build the transfer QR code.
scanThisQR: Scan this QR code with the app to make the transfer
nfcTagsText: Convert any NFC tag into a digital wallet linked to your account.
deleteNFCTagConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the NFC tag with name {name}?
nfcTagHint: Tap to start scanning. If using a phone, the reader is in the back.
noTags: There are no NFC tags associated to your account yet.
enterTransactionDataNfc: Set a transfer description and an amount before scanning the NFC tag.
bringNfcTag: Bring the NFC tag close to the device to scan it.
deleteAccountText: Completely delete your account and delete all your data in this platform inlcuding your profile, offers, needs and your account. You need to have a positive or zero balance to delete your account, contact your administrator otherwise.
deleteAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action will delete all your data forever in the platform and you won't be able to log again in after that. If you account has positive balance, it will be moved to the selected account.
moveBalanceToHint: Select the account where your balance will be moved before deleting your account
acceptExternalPaymentsAutomaticallyHint: Automatically accept all external transfer requests.
newGroupText: Fill the following fields to request the creation of a new community in this server. If you want to create an account in an existing community, go back to 'Find your local community'. Don't request a new community just for testing, as you can use the demo site. Please read the documentation before applying. By clicking the submit button you accept the terms of use of this service. The request will be reviewed by the administrators and it will be rejected if it is not complete and correct. Be sure to set a clear description and add all means of contact. After the community is created, you will be the administrator and you will be able to setup the settings of the currency, as well as accept other members to join.
groupCodeHint: 4 uppercase letter code. It is used to identify your community and currency in the system. It can't be changed after creation.
descriptionHint: Briefly describe your community. What is the influence area, main goals, desired impact, governance model, singularities, etc.
editCurrencyText: Define the main attributes of your currency.
codeTaken: This code is already in use
newGroupRequestedText: Your request for the new community {name} has been sent and it will be manually reviewed. You will receive an email when it is activated and you can start configuring it. If you don't receive any response in a few days, please contact the team.
dailyVolumeText: Sum of all transfers in the last 24 hours
monthlyVolumeText: Sum of all transfers in the last 30 days
yearlyVolumeText: Sum of all transfers in the last 365 days
allTimeVolumeText: Sum of all transfers since the community was created
volumeChartText: Sum of all transfers over the selected period
activeAccountsChartText: Accounts with at least one transfer over the selected period
monthlyActiveAccountsText: Accounts with at least one transfer in the last month
yearlyActiveAccountsText: Accounts with at least one transfer in the last year
monthlyTransactionsText: Number of transfers in the last month
yearlyTransactionsText: Number of transfers in the last year
appUpdateAvailable: A new version of the app is available
disableAccountConfirmText: Are you sure you want to disable your account? Your account and all your data will be hidden and you won't be able to make or receive transfers until you re-enable it.
enableAccountConfirmText: Your account and your data will be visible again and you will be able to make and receive transfers.
loggedOut: You have been logged out and you won't receive any further notifications until you log in again.
unsubscribedText: You will no longer receive community newsletter emails. You can change your email preferences at any time in your settings.
ErrorPositionPermisionDenied: Error: Permision denied while trying to get your position
ErrorNotificationsPermissionDenied: Error: Permission denied while trying to subscribe to push notifications
ErrorBadRequest: Error: Data validation failed in server
ErrorInsufficientMaximumBalance: The destination's maximum balance is insufficient
ErrorNoTrustPath: Transfer failed because there is no exchange path between the two currencies
ErrorInvalidTransfersCSVFileLineColumn: Error parsing the CSV file in line {line} column {column}
ErrorCamNotAllowed: The app does not have permission to use the camera. You can allow it in the browser settings.
ErrorCamNotFound: No camera found in this device
ErrorCamNotReadable: Could not read camera. Maybe it is being used by another app.
ErrorNFCUnavailable: Web NFC is not available in your system. Currently only Chrome in Android is supported.
ErrorAccountIsNotYours: The specified account is not your current active account.
ErrorInvalidAmount: Invalid amount. Enter a positive number.
